entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 3.1°C

Temperature: 3.1°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Light snow or rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
